channel.title: Run Server Error Help Please!
channel.description: Ok, following God of Ikiili's guide I did everything, but when I runserver.bat i get a command prompt error saying "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError". Please help I am using JDK2 and stuff.

item.title: Run Server Error Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @uberlol uberlol
item.description:
@uberlol wrote:

I used five different source! same error.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 11:33:51 AM[/size][hr]One of my friend suggested its my computers fault and I wont be able to make a server on this computer, any other suggestions or ideas on how to soleve the problem would be REALLY appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

I got a source that did that, and basically u either messed something up on accident, or the source is just screwed. I suggest getting a new source by finding it in the download section of these forums.

Read full topic
